channel.title: Rails Workflow
channel.description: Rails Workflow began as a fork of the [Workflow](https://github.com/geekq/workflow) gem by [Vladimir Dobriakov](http://www.mobile-web-consulting.de). It is a nearly total rewrite but maintains the same core architecture. It is released under the [MIT License](/license).

item.title: Welcome to Rails-Workflow!
item.description: Check out the Jekyll docs for more info on how to get the most out of Jekyll. File all bugs/feature requests at Jekyllâ€™s GitHub repo. If you have questions, you can ask them on Jekyll Talk.
